description: As Run is from planet Memorze, she can change gender in mind and body upon triggering a specific stimulus; in her case, a sneeze. As a girl, Run is in love with Rito, due to the kiss, and blames Lala for her misfortunes. However, her boy form, Ren, is still in competition, albeit one-sided, with Rito for Lala`s hand in marriage. Currently, Run is a famous idol, having released several albums.
name: Run Elsie Jewelria
